meanings.sent1: I saw a huge bearpaw print in the mud.
meanings.sent2: The bearpaw was covered in thick fur.
meanings.sent3: The bearpaw waved at me from the zoo enclosure.
meanings.sent4: Her grip was as strong as a bearpaw.
meanings.sent5: The bearpaw left a deep impression in the snow.

meanings.definition: A type of winter boot made from sheepskin and wool.
meanings.sent1: She wore cozy bearpaw boots to keep her feet warm.
meanings.sent2: The bearpaw boots were lined with soft wool.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally stepped on his own bearpaw boot.
meanings.sent4: The bearpaw boots felt like walking on clouds.
meanings.sent5: Her bearpaw boots were a lifesaver in the cold weather.
